functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.

msg.content: What universities did the general managers of the top three performing teams by record in the Eastern and Western conferences in the 2022-2023 season attend?
What universities did the general managers of the top three performing teams by record in the Eastern and Western conferences in the 2022-2023 season attend?

msg.content: To find out the universities attended by the general managers of the top three performing teams in the Eastern and Western conferences in the 2022-2023 season, we need to first identify the general managers of those teams. Let's start by finding out the general managers of the top three teams in each conference.
